text: Dr. Renu Jogi is an Indian politician. She was elected to the Chhattisgarh Legislative Assembly from Kota in the 2018 Chhattisgarh Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Janta Congress Chhattisgarh. She is wife of 1st Chief Minister of Chhattisgarh Ajit Jogi. She worked as an associate professor in Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Medical College, Indore in Ophthalmology Department. She has also written a Book "Basic Ophthalmology by Renu Jogi" (Jaypee publication). title: Renu Jogi
